    • Uses of StandardEquipmentControlCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022.interfaces

      Subinterfaces of StandardEquipmentControlCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022.interfaces 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PlanningEquipmentControlCI
      The component interface PlanningEquipmentControlCI defines the operations that a controller can perform on an equipment which can have planned programs.
      interface  SuspensionAndPlanningEquipmentControlCI
      The component interface SuspensionAndPlanningEquipmentControlCI merges the capabilities of both of the inherited interfaces.
      interface  SuspensionEquipmentControlCI
      The component interface SuspensionEquipmentControlCI defines the standard operation that an equipment implements to let the controller suspend them i.e.

    • Uses of StandardEquipmentControlCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e1.equipments.hem

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e1.equipments.hem that implement StandardEquipmentControlCI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HeaterConnector
      The class HeaterConnector manually implements a connector bridging the gap between the given generic component interface SuspensionEquipmentControlCIand the actual component interface offered by the thermostated heater component (HeaterCI).
      class  PlanningEquipmentControlOutboundPort
      The class PlanningEquipmentControlOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the PlanningEquipmentControlCI component interface.
      class  StandardEquipmentControlOutboundPort
      The class StandardEquipmentControlOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the StandardEquipmentControlCI component interface.
      class  SuspensionAndPlanningEquipmentControlOutboundPort
      The class SuspensionAndPlanningEquipmentControlOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the SuspensionAndPlanningEquipmentControlCI component interface.
      class  SuspensionEquipmentControlOutboundPort
      The class SuspensionEquipmentControlOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the SuspensionEquipmentControlCI component interface.
